title: Person Schema
description: The Person Archetype - Essential properties that define a person

person_address.description:
To add multiple address lines, use

person_city.description: The city or town where the person is located.

person_region.description: The general region where the person is located.  Can be a US state, or a province, for instance.

category.description: General category of the person, e.g. Friends, Family, etc.

subcategory.description: Specific category of the person, e.g. Best Friends, Parent, etc

created.description: Date and time the entry was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time the entry was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD
